Dialog: <start>

<speaker>Encoder</speaker>
<dialog>An ENCODER stores the state of one qubit into three qubits.</dialog>

<speaker>Encoder</speaker>
<dialog>It does this in a special way called an error correcting code, so that even if one qubit is lost the other two can be used to get the original qubit back. </dialog>

<speaker>Encoder</speaker>
<dialog>To get back the original qubit you’ll need a DECODER.</dialog>
<end>

<speaker>Encoder</speaker>
<dialog>To use the ENCODER you need 2 pickles.</dialog>
<start>

<speaker>Decoder</speaker>
<dialog>A DECODER takes the parts of an error-correcting code and gives you back the original qubit. </dialog>

<speaker>Decoder</speaker>
<dialog>You need at least two of the three qubits of the error correcting code for the decoder to work. </dialog>
<end>
<start>

<speaker>Bell Pairs</speaker>
<dialog>Sometimes two qubits can be ENTANGLED.</dialog>

<speaker>Bell Pairs</speaker>
<dialog>When qubits are entangled they share a special relationship, and can be used to do QUANTUM TELEPORTATION.</dialog>
<end>
<start>

<speaker>Teleporter</speaker>
<dialog>A quantum teleporter can be used to send qubits from place to place.</dialog>

<speaker>Teleporter</speaker>
<dialog>To travel between two teleporters, the teleporters have to each hold one of the qubits from a single Bell pair. 

Use 'X' to shoot one at each teleporter.</dialog>

<speaker>Teleporter</speaker>
<dialog>The teleporters will change colour to show you which other teleporter they share a Bell pair with. </dialog>
<end>
<start>

<speaker>Fire Hazard</speaker>
<dialog>Qubits are fragile. If they get too warm, they’ll decohere. This means they lose their quantum information.</dialog>
<end>
<start>

<speaker>Intro</speaker>
<dialog>Joey the Otter has been hard at work in the lab, and wants to go visit Bob on Mars for a picnic. Help Joey get there!

Joey is a qubit and obeys the laws of Quantum Information.

Press c for Controls.</dialog>
<end>
<start>

<speaker>Controls</speaker>
<dialog>Movement: Arrow Keys or WASD
Interact: SPACEBAR
Shoot Entanglement Bit: X
Open Info Dialog (when icon appears in UI bar): I
Restart Level: R</dialog>
<end>
